meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Erase</kanji> your need for normal <kanji>tea</kanji> by drinking <vocabulary>matcha</vocabulary>. It is far superior to all others and you'll never turn back once you've had a taste.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
